sn45.55:1.2: See [MN 2](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=mn2) and it’s comments for more on _yoniso manasikāra_: the only factor apart from wrong instruction that is single-handedly capable of making or breaking one’s practice.
sn45.55:1.5: None of these eight factors are things that can simply be “performed” in a straightforward manner based on the information of what they are. Without _yoniso manasikāra_, no matter how sincere one’s attempt is to develop any of these aspects of the path, it will not be in accordance with the Middle Way.
